rules_text: Whenever an anomaly enters under your control, target player mills three cards. [i](A card with multiple card types is an anomaly)[/i]
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/G8z9a

OG art_1:
@JoelCHoltzman On twitter
https://twitter.com/JoelCHoltzman/status/1447896163416412168/photo/2


OG_2:
The first time an instant or sorcery card is put into your graveyard each turn, tap target creature an opponent controls with mana value less than or equal to that card’s mana value.

OG_1:
Whenever you cast your second instant or sorcery spell each turn, tap target creature an opponent controls. it doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
